hdspecials.description: he longer days of spring are the perfect time to promote the light-transforming benefits of Luminette Privacy Sheers and Silhoutte Window Shadings during the Celebration of Light Savings Event. These exquisite window fashions allow your customers to soften, shift and refine the light that enters their homes into beautiful illumination.
hdspecials.descriptiontwo: Save $100 Rebate with the purchase of 1 Luminette Privacy Sheer. Plus $100 rebate for each additional unit.
hdspecials.descriptionthree: Save $100 Rebate with the purchases of 2 Silhoutte Window Shadings Plus $50 Rebate for each additional unit.
hdspecials.descriptionfour: Valid for purchases made 4/14/18 - 6/25/18. The Alustra Collection products from applicable products lines are included.
hdspecials.descriptionfive: See the store for more details!

otherspecials.description: Customers who purchase qualifying Armstrong Flooring products during March 19th - May  15th will qualify for a 10% rebate up to $500. Offer Valid March 19th - May15th 2018
